headline: The Science of Comfort: Sunnystep x MIT Sports Lab Collaboration
description: At Sunnystep, we believe that comfort is an art and a science. To push the boundaries of what a shoe can do, we knew we needed to think beyond traditional design. Thats why we teamed up with one of the brightest minds in research and innovationtheMIT Sports Lab. Together, were not just making shoes; were redefining the
